title: Bringing To Light
description:
Annie Tan, Sufian Zhemukhov, and Paul Barach share stories about immigrant parents, old fashioned romance and some things more important than Star Wars.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Frank Zappa, the Mothers of Invention, Lea Solanga, Sufian Zhemukhov, Joe Jackson, Meco, Allegiance Original Broadway Cast, Annie Tan, Kevin Allison, Paul Barach)
